description:
Share Reward for “The Golden Age Testnet


If you have Xxxx QM Points at "The Golden Age Testnet" Season, you will receive: A QUAI


Your QM Point is based on adjusted QUAI volume and your Pointing relative to other users determines your allocation.


* Qualifying transactions must be The Golden Age Testnet and reach over 1,000 QM Points (equivalent to 100 QUAI).


* Based on QM points, there are 9 tiers (table above) eligible for rewards.


* The claim period is only 30 days, starting to allow claims.
